bio: A renowned Yo-criminal. Cheatler once used his menacing pincers to herd an ant colony into the desks of elementary school students.

soultimate.name: Black Scissors
soultimate.description: Frontal assault dealing massive damage to foes.

skill.effect: Increases the power of Soultimate Moves by 50%.
skill.name: Heavy Hitter

name: Cheatler
